sub_title: Product, Program and Project Management Executive in Media (OTT, IPTV), Technology, and Telecom sectors
summary: With over 25 years of experience managing products and projects for top-ranking companies and Fortune 500 accounts in Turkey, I possess exceptional skills in the technology and media sectors. My extensive product and project management knowledge, bolstered by a proven track record of success, makes me an ideal addition to any team seeking to excel in these areas. My active management style and dynamic approach will drive your organization forward.

education.field_of_study: Institute of Science and Technology, Telecommunication Engineering
Institute of Science and Technology, Telecommunication Engineering
Yildiz Technical Un. Faculty of Electrical and Electronic Eng, Electronics and Telecom. Eng.

projects.title: TurkNet Smart Wi-Fi
projects.description:
•	Successfully executed Airties' Smart Wi-Fi solutions, including access CPEs, Cloud Platform, and Vision Companion App, resulting in a remarkable 15% monthly revenue increase and a significant 37% improvement in customer satisfaction.
•	Enhanced targeted features and improved UX/UI design to achieve these impressive results. 
•	Pioneered the launch of Turknet Smart Wi-Fi solutions, featuring 100,000 access CPEs, Cloud Platform, and Vision Companion App, solidifying Airties' position as a market leader. 
•	Utilized innovative strategies to drive sales and meet business objectives, resulting in unprecedented growth and success for the company.

contributors.headline: Product, Program and Project Management Executive in Media (OTT, IPTV), Technology, and Telecom sectors

projects.title: Tivibu Multiscreen TV
projects.description:
•	Managed the successful end-to-end implementation of the ZTE Premium Video Solution for the Türk Telekom Multiscreen TV project, resulting in a seamless transition from the existing Ericsson MTV Solution.
•	Utilized Waterfall methodology for backend development and Agile and Scrum methodology for client development, ensuring efficient and effective project execution.
•	Oversaw the delivery of backend solution components, including MW, CDN, CMS, DRM, Monitoring and Reporting Systems, and client-side components such as STB and OTT Clients for a variety of devices, ensuring the timely delivery of high-quality solutions.
•	Led and motivated a team of 50 media specialists, driving their performance to achieve project goals and ensure successful project execution.
•	Successfully migrated 1.5 million OTT customers and 1 million IPTV customers to the Tivibu Multiscreen TV platform, which is now used by over 3 million customers.
•	Completed a $25 million project within 2 years, demonstrating strong project management skills

projects.title: S Sport + OTT
projects.description:
•	Led the successful delivery of live sports events, including Premier League, Bundesliga, Liga Portugal matches, Formula 1 races, and combat sports events, through S Sport, an OTT service provider in Turkey. 
•	Utilized the Erlab Cloud Video Platform infrastructure to encode live content in HLS and DASH formats, using the MP4 package to ensure optimal streaming quality. 
•	Transformed live content into VoD format post-event, enhancing accessibility and convenience for viewers. 
•	Developed and implemented Apple TV and Android TV clients, web, iOS, Android mobile clients, and Samsung and LG Smart TV clients to expand the reach of S Sport's offerings. 
•	Migrated a total of 200,000 customers to the Cloud Video Platform, ensuring seamless transitions and minimal disruption to their viewing experience. 
•	Successfully grew S Sport Plus service to more than 350,000 customers, achieving outstanding customer satisfaction and retention rates.

contributors.headline: Product, Program and Project Management Executive in Media (OTT, IPTV), Technology, and Telecom sectors

projects.title: Tivibu New UI and Client Development
projects.description:
•	Implemented a new Tivibu User Interface across all platforms: IPTV, Smart TV, Mobile, and Web TV.
•	Initiated the project by rolling out the new interface on IPTV and Smart TV platforms with subsequent updates to Mobile and Web TV clients.
•	Employed active verbs to streamline the design process, enhance user experience and maximize functionality. 
•	Ensured seamless integration of the new interface with existing platforms, resulting in a significant increase in user engagement and satisfaction.

profile_positions.description: I acted as a leader to develop the Cloud Video Platform solution using Agile methodology.
